      Classes in repast.simphony.query that implement Query 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPropertyQuery<T>
      Abstact implementation of a query that queries based on an object's property.
      class  AndQuery<T>
      A query whose result is the intersection of its sub queries.
      class  InstanceOfQuery<T>
      Query that returns objects in a given context that are instances of the specified type.
      class  NotQuery<T>
      A query whose results are the negation of its sub-query.
      class  OrQuery<T>
      A query whose result is the union of its sub queries.
      class  PropertyEquals<T>
      Query that returns any objects in a context with a specified property whose value is equal to some specified value.
      class  PropertyGreaterThan<T>
      Query that returns any objects in a context with a specified property whose value is greater than some specified value.
      class  PropertyGreaterThanEquals<T>
      Query that returns any objects in a context with a specified property whose value is greater than or equal to some specified value.
      class  PropertyLessThan<T>
      Query that returns any objects in a context with a specified property whose value is less than some specified value.
      class  PropertyLessThanEquals<T>
      Query that returns any objects in a context with a specified property whose value is less than or equal to some specified value.
      class  PropertyNotEquals<T>
      Query that returns any objects in a context with a specified property whose value is not equal to some specified value.
      class  WithinDistance<T>
      Base class for queries whose results contains all the objects within some distance of a specified object.
      Constructors in repast.simphony.query with parameters of type Query 
      Constructor and Description
      AndQuery(Query<T> query1, Query<T> query2)
      Creates an AndQuery from the two sub-queries.
      AndQuery(Query<T> query1, Query<T> query2)
      Creates an AndQuery from the two sub-queries.
      NotQuery(Context<T> context, Query<T> query)
      Creates a NotQuery whose results will contain all the members of the specified context that are not in the specified query's results.
      OrQuery(Query<T> query1, Query<T> query2)
      Creates an OrQuery from the two sub-queries.

      class  AbstractGeometryQuery<T>
      Abstract implementation of geometry based queries.
      class  ContainsQuery<T>
      Query that determines what objects are contained by a geometry.
      class  GeographyWithin<T>
      Query that returns items in a geography that are some specified distance from another item or a geometry.
      class  IntersectsQuery<T>
      Query that determines what objects are intersected by a geometry.
      class  TouchesQuery<T>
      Query that returns objects touched by a geometry.
      class  WithinQuery<T>
      Query that returns objects a specific a geometry is within.

      Abstract base class for grid queries.

      A within type query over a grid space.
      class  MooreQuery<T>
      Queries a grid for the Moore neighborhood of a specific point or object.
      class  VNQuery<T>
      Queries a grid for the Von Neumann neighborhood of a specific point or object.
